suncertify.remote
Class DataRegistry

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.remote.DataRegistry
public class DataRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

DataRegistry starts the rmi registry. Registers the RemoteDataFacadePool and provides methods to register and unregister the RemoteDataFacade instances when they are needed. Keeps a map of the registered remote objects so that they are kept alive and not released immediately.

DataRegistry is a singleton.

public void shutDown()
Shuts down the registry. Clean up operations are executed before shutting down
